import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-modal' import { IoIosStar, IoMdTime, IoIosPlay } from 'react-icons/io' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../css/modal.css' Modal.setAppElement('#root') class MovieModal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.closeModal = this.closeModal.bind(this); } closeModal(){ return this.props.isOpen } render() { return (

{this.props.data.title}

{this.props.data.vote_average}

{this.props.data.runtime}min

); } } export default MovieModal
